details: Removed Button component with FilterListIcon (non-functional filter button)
Simplified layout by removing Box wrapper around SearchField
Removed gap styling between search and filter elements
Updated phase from 'Testing and Verification' to 'Remove Filter Buttons'
Updated all tool path permissions to reference new task worktree: 137-remove-or-implement-non-functional-filter-buttons

patterns_discovered.description: Non-functional UI elements (Filter button) cleanly removed with associated imports
patterns_discovered.applicability: Helps maintain clean codebase by eliminating dead UI code

patterns_discovered.description: Simplified flex layout after removing secondary component
patterns_discovered.applicability: When removing UI elements from layout groups, unnecessary wrapper divs can be eliminated

patterns_discovered.description: Automatic state tracking and workspace management between different subtasks
patterns_discovered.applicability: Framework maintains consistent metadata across task switches

patterns_discovered.description: Change set is focused solely on Filter button removal without broader refactoring
patterns_discovered.applicability: Single-responsibility commits are cleaner and easier to review/revert

gotchas_discovered.gotcha: Import cleanup required with component removal
gotchas_discovered.context: FilterListIcon import must be removed to avoid unused import warnings
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Complete removal of unused imports as part of component deletion

gotchas_discovered.context: Flex Box wrapper was only used to space Search and Filter components
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Unnecessary wrapper can be safely removed when secondary component is deleted

gotchas_discovered.gotcha: Task spec ID format in configuration
gotchas_discovered.context: Configuration uses specific task spec naming convention with trailing dash
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Ensure configuration updates match exact naming pattern for task references

approach_outcome.description: Successfully removed non-functional Filter button from MaterialsPage UI with clean removal of associated imports and layout simplification. Change executed in single session (Session 6) with proper state management updates. No additional refactoring or testing complications encountered.

recommendations.recommendation: Consider implementing actual filter functionality for materials if filter button was placeholder for future feature
Verify SearchField search functionality is sufficient for user needs or add other discovery mechanisms
Add test coverage for MaterialsPage layout to prevent regression if filter functionality is re-added
Update any user documentation that may have referenced filter functionality
